Birmingham New Street to FiveWays (inclusive)
column5: * Where the first train is longer than 6 x 23 metrelength overall+ Where the first train is NOT longer than 6 x 23metre length overall AND does not stop at FiveWays. The second train must stop at Five Ways.The third train must depart/pass Birmingham NewStreet at 4 minute headway. This revised headwaycan be applied on two occasions in a clock facehour.
